Title: Android
Writer: James Reigle, Don Keith Opper, Will Reigle (based on an original idea by)
Actors: Klaus Kinski, Don Keith Opper, Brie Howard, Norbert Weisser
Plot: Eccentric scientist Dr.Daniel and his shy, clumsy assistant Max, lead a quiet life on their space station where they carry out illegal research into androids, until they receive an unwelcome visit from three fugitives from justice, one of whom is female. Dr.Daniel and Max are both interested in her, but one of them has rather more sinister intentions than just romance. At first, they all get along, but when one of the criminals becomes psychotic, violence erupts. Meanwhile, the space police is on their trail.
